meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Caron Andregg Hank Simpson Lisa Guay Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1204.

td.p: Caron Andregg, an account executive from San Diego, California
Hank Simpson, a mechanical engineer from Bath, Maine
Lisa Guay, a homemaker from Champlain, New York (whose 2-day cash winnings total $18,400)

tr.td: THE OLD WEST
"P"s & "Q"s
ADS & COMMERCIALS
CANALS
SILENT MOVIES
TITLES

3rd place: Maytag Jetclean dishwaher + Jeopardy! box game or computerized version
2nd place: trip on Delta to Miami, Florida & stay at Sheraton Bal Harbour + Jeopardy! box game or computerized version

Hank
Caron

(including 2 DDs),
